{"id":970999547,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2Â weeks","timestamp":1686735817,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/970999547/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"40.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if(n==0) return 1;\n        if(n ==1 ) return x;\n        if(n== -1) return 1/x;\n\n        int k = n/2;\n        double val = myPow(x, k);\n\n        double sub = 1;\n        if(n % 2 != 0) {\n        if(n > 0) sub = x;\n        if(n < 0) sub = 1/x;\n        }\n\n        return val * val * sub;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false}
